description:
Gordon is a 25-year-old straight guy who works as an electrician.
"How is business these days?" I asked. "You know, with the housing slump and such."
"It sucks," he said. "Everything is real slow. Not much work these days."
"Is that part of why you're here?" I asked. "To make some extra money?"
"I guess," he said. "I was thinking about maybe changing careers. I love fucking chicks and I'm good at it so..."
"You want to be a porn star?"
"Yeah, why not..."
Gordon mentioned that he has a girlfriend.
"How does she feel about it?" I asked.
"She's great. Real open. We fuck all the time and she loves sex, so no problem there."
I asked him what kind of girls he likes.
"I like tight asses. I don't like big titties because they usually come with a big ass," he said...
title: Gordon
